name: VR - Mountain Tourist Roller Coaster
description:
This experience is for VR mobile virtual reality headsets like Cardboard. Use your virtual reality headset to take a ride on a scary high definition virtual reality rollercoaster. Ride a deserted vr roller-coaster. See the fabulous dream land of Virtual World and get experience of the real life sensation of this 3D roller coaster and exciting environment with your mobile virtual reality headset that design only for you. Take a tour to an incredible memorable places. With longest-lasting adventure. That Sinking Feeling of riding Awesome Roller Coaster! And this one will make you crazy. It is one of the first 360 real roller coasters available on the store. Always look for Awesome VR titles...In this one you going to meet.
Key Features;
- 360 degree rotation
- Stunning 3D Graphics
- Addictive Game Play
- Swipe-based control system!
- Advanced graphics!
- Play it anytime, anywhere!
- Dynamic music won’t let you get bore
